keyEvents.title: Battle Between Straw Hats and Kuma
keyEvents.description: The exhausted Straw Hat Pirates face off against Bartholomew Kuma on Thriller Bark, with Zoro, Franky, Sanji, and Usopp all attempting to fight the Warlord but being easily defeated.
keyEvents.significance: The location serves as the stage for one of the crew's most desperate battles against an overwhelmingly powerful opponent.

keyEvents.title: Thriller Bark Devastated by Ursus Shock
keyEvents.description: Kuma's Ursus Shock technique creates a massive paw-shaped explosion that devastates the entire island-ship of Thriller Bark, destroying buildings, uprooting trees, and knocking out nearly everyone present.
keyEvents.significance: This event causes catastrophic damage to Thriller Bark, showing the incredible destructive power of Kuma's Devil Fruit and marking a turning point in the arc. The aftermath of this destruction sets the stage for the iconic events of the next episode.

statusChanges.description: Thriller Bark suffers massive structural damage from Kuma's Ursus Shock attack, with buildings destroyed, trees uprooted, and the island left in ruins.
